dict.acceptation: 剩余物，残骸；残余；遗迹；遗体；
搁置；剩余，剩下；逗留；终属，归于；

sent.orig: Unless you accept death, you remain half, you remain part, you remain lopsided.
sent.trans: 除非你接受死，否则你留下一半，你留下一部分，你将不能平衡。

sent.orig: They remain friend despite all their differences. they remain friend in spite of all their difference.
sent.trans: 尽管看法不同，他们还是好朋友。

sent.orig: And classes still remain and will remain in the era of the dictatorship of the proletariat.
sent.trans: 并且阶级会依然存在，会在无产阶级专政时期存在。

sent.orig: The bonds of unity we felt then remain today, and they will always remain.
sent.trans: 结合这标语来保持我们今天的感觉，它会一直保持下去。

sent.orig: Jobs and pay remain iffy in areas like asset-backed securities where markets remain frozen.
sent.trans: 在市场依然冻结的资产支持证券等领域，就业和薪酬状况仍不容乐观。
